fields.name: Fun fact:
fields.value:
The message that replaced 'I am blackmailed.' is literally just '...'
Attack: None | Defense: None

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose a player each night to create a Voodoo Doll of, silencing them the next day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your target cannot talk or whisper the next day.
- You cannot silence the same player twice in a row.
- With the Necronomicon, your will also deal a Basic Attack to your target.
- Silenced players will not be able to vote during the Discussion phase, but can vote during the Judgement phase. Since this is GIM, however, they cannot vote at all. L.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose the Coven.
